channel.title: Charlie & Yash
channel.itunes:subtitle: A driven discussion.

channel.itunes:summary: In which Charlie and Yash drive from and sometimes to their institution of education and discuss.

item.title: Ethics and the Decline of Suburbia
item.itunes:summary: In which Charlie and Yash discuss a riveting conversation with a mutual acquaintance on ethics and note the influence of housing on adult friendships.
